titles.title: A resolution commending the service of the 56th Stryker Brigade Combat Team of the Pennsylvania Army National Guard.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 11/2/2009--Introduced. Expresses gratitude to the members of the Army National Guard and Air National Guard of Pennsylvania and their families for their service and sacrifice on behalf of the United States. Commends the members of the 56th Brigade Combat Team (Stryker) of the Pennsylvania Army National Guard on the completion of their deployment to Iraq. Recognizes that Team's achievements, as well as all other formerly and presently deployed Pennsylvania Army and Air National Guard units and members, for their exemplary service.
